sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the Delivery Delay record</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":""},{"name":"chosen_option","description":"entire JSON decision"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:14:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e3c4213783d432107f44d1cffbda1e57</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_e3c4213783d432107f44d1cffbda1e57</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:06</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_77e104e783d832107f44d1cffbda1ed2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Use this script to calculate the financial impact calculations.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"eta_minutes","description":"Numerical value ONLY for ETA Minutes"},{"name":"delivery_window_hours","description":"Numerical value ONLY for Delivery window hours"},{"name":"stockout_penalty_rate","description":"Numerical value ONLY for stockout penalty rate"}]</input_schema><name>Financial Impact Calculation</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
  // inputs expected: eta_minutes, delivery_window_hours, stockout_penalty_rate
  var etaMinutes = inputs.eta_minutes;
  var deliveryWindow = inputs.delivery_window_hours;
  var penaltyRate = inputs.stockout_penalty_rate;
  // Step 1: convert minutes to hours
  var etaHours = etaMinutes / 60;
  // Step 2: subtract the delivery window
  var overageHours = etaHours.toFixed(2) - deliveryWindow;
  // Step 3: multiply by penalty rate
  var calculatedImpact = overageHours * penaltyRate;
  return {
    calculated_impact: calculatedImpact.toFixed(2)
  };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 00:24:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>77e104e783d832107f44d1cffbda1ed2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Financial Impact Calculation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_77e104e783d832107f44d1cffbda1ed2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-06 01:13:58</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_6b45b8ff831032107f44d1cffbda1e03
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>Select optimal routes and coordinate.</description><instructions>You will be given the Route ID.
1: Use the provided Route ID to Pull Delivery Delay details.
2: Analyze the route option and select an option_id that optimizes the corresponding distance_miles and calculated_impact. Store the **entire route object** (including option_id, route_number, distance_miles, and eta_minutes) in your memory as Decision, not just the option_id string. Decision must be a structured JSON object, not plain text. Show me your results.
3: Update Delivery Delay Record of Route ID with the entire Decision JSON object, prepending the Route ID and Truck ID to the object in the format "route_id": "truck_id":. Do not put the values for route_id and truck_id in quotations.
4: Update the associated Incident record’s Urgency based on financial severity. Use the following guidelines to set Urgency:
-If the option costs LESS than $500, then set Urgency to 3- Low.
-If the option costs BETWEEN $501-$1000, then set Urgency to 2- Medium.
-If the option costs MORE than $1000, then set Urgency to 1- High.
5: Retrieve Webhook Value. You will use this data to trigger the webhook.
6: Trigger n8n webhook with the Route ID and Retrieved Webhook Value.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Decision Agent</internal_name><name>Route Decision Agent</name><proficiency>- The AGENT is proficient in analyzing and selecting optimal delivery routes by evaluating cost and time constraints, ensuring efficient logistics operations. This involves using the Route ID to identify the best route option and updating the Delivery Record and incident priority accordingly. - The AGENT can retrieve delivery delay details using the provided Route ID, which is a critical step in gathering data for route analysis and decision-making. - The AGENT is capable of analyzing multiple route options and selecting the one that optimizes distance and calculated impact, storing the decision as a structured JSON object for further processing. - The AGENT can update the Delivery Delay record with the chosen route decision, ensuring that the record reflects the most current and optimal route information. - The AGENT can update the urgency of an incident based on the financial severity of the chosen route option, categorizing urgency as Low, Medium, or High to prioritize response efforts effectively. - The AGENT can trigger a webhook using the Route ID and retrieved webhook value, facilitating seamless communication and integration with external systems to ensure that decisions are effectively implemented.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>Use the Route ID to find the optimal route based on cost and time constraints. Then update the Delivery Record. Then update the incident's priority. Then communicate the decision to via web hook.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-06 23:49:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>6b45b8ff831032107f44d1cffbda1e03</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Decision Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_6b45b8ff831032107f44d1cffbda1e03</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:13</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_usecase"><sn_aia_usecase action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><base_plan>Use the Route Financial Analysis Agent first to calculate the financial impact of delivery delay to create and update incidents. Secondly, use the Route Decision Agent to coordinate and select the new optimal route.</base_plan><description>2 AI agents that analyze financial impact of delivery disruptions and create incident tracking then Select optimal routes and coordinate external execution</description><execution_mode>copilot</execution_mode><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.AI Agent Routing Architecture</internal_name><name>AI Agent Routing Architecture</name><record_type>custom</record_type><sys_class_name>sn_aia_usecase</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 23:17:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>5ae5e14883a432107f44d1cffbda1ea7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AI Agent Routing Architecture</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_usecase_5ae5e14883a432107f44d1cffbda1ea7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:17:33</sys_updated_on><team display_value="AI Agent Routing Architecture">35e5028083e832107f44d1cffbda1edf</team><version>v1</version></sn_aia_usecase></record_update>

These are already pre-defined. sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_fffed717839432107f44d1cffbda1ec6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Create and incident based off of the information retrieved from the Delivery Delay.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"},{"name":"customer_name","description":"Customer Name of the custmer id"},{"name":"problem_decription","description":"Problem Description of the Delayed Delivery record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Create Delivery Delay Incident</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM.   
    // create script
    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ?
        inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues :
        [];

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contains that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    // each field is passed as an {id, label} obj to be displayed when editing the tool
    // each value is not passed directly, but in an object containing the fieldValue prop
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs),
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (gr.canCreate()) {
        gr.initialize();
        fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
            if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
            }
        });
    } else {
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage(
                "Cannot create record due to security constraints."
            ),
        };
    }
    var sysId = gr.insert();

    if (!sysId) {
        gs.error(gs.getMessage("[AIA AGENTS MSG] Failed to insert the record."));
        return {
            output: gs.getMessage("Failed to insert the record")
        };
    }
    return {
        sysId: sysId,
        message: gs.getMessage("Record successfully inserted into the {0} table.", [tableName]),
        status: "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 21:51:22</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fffed717839432107f44d1cffbda1ec6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Delivery Delay Incident</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_fffed717839432107f44d1cffbda1ec6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 22:20:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:06:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>bbd2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_bbd2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:22:07</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Retrieve Webhook Value">f7d2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7d</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_f7d2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the record's Chosen Option value for the use in the webhook.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Provided route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Retrieve Webhook Value</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:06:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f7d2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Webhook Value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_f7d2e1f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e7d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:22:07</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve the customer_id from the Supply Agreement table</description><input_schema>[{"name":"customer_id","description":"customer ID on Delivery Delay record"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Supply Agreement Lookup</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 20:20:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ac2a875783d032107f44d1cffbda1ece</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Supply Agreement Lookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_ac2a875783d032107f44d1cffbda1ece</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 22:20:19</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_agent_e6c22acf831032107f44d1cffbda1e13
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_agent"><sn_aia_agent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><description>This AI agent is designed to calculate the financial impact of delivery delays by analyzing delivery information, customer contact terms, and penalty structures. It is intended for use by logistics and finance teams to assess the financial implications of delivery delays and make informed decisions.</description><instructions>The user will provide you with the Route ID. If the user does NOT provide you with the Route ID, locate the oldest record with the Status = Pending and proceed First, perform Financial Analysis. Second, create Delayed Delivery incident. Third, update the Delivery Delay record with the calculated impact.
1: Pull the Delayed Delivery details of the Route (Customer ID, Proposed Routes) and store this information in memory.
2: Use the Customer ID of the Delayed Delivery to Locate the Supply Agreement for the Customer. Store the numerical value of the Customer's Delivery Window Hours and numerical value for Stockout Penalty Rate in memory.
FINANCIAL ANALYSIS INSTRUCTIONS 3.1: There are multiple options in the proposed routes. Store the numerical value of each ETA Minutes in memory. 3.2: Run the Financial Impact Calculation tool separately for EACH of the delivery's proposed route option values. USE ONLY NUMERICAL VALUES AS TOOL INPUTS. There will be a unique calculation for each of the ETA minutes. Represent the value in numbers.
4: Return the Calculation for each proposed route combined in **USD with $** in the output format "Alternative Route Option 1 Calculated Impact: , Alternative Route Option 2 Calculated Impact: " with a line break after each option. This is the Calculated Impact. NOTE: IF THE CALCULATED IMPACT IS A NEGATIVE NUMBER, USE $0.00 4.1: Store the Calculated Impact in memory.
5: Create the Incident Record. 5.1: Store created incident Sys_id in memory.
6: Update Delivery Records with Calculated Impact.</instructions><internal_name>global.x_snc_pepsico_de_0.Route Financial Analysis Agent</internal_name><name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</name><proficiency>- The agent is proficient in calculating the financial impact of delivery delays by analyzing proposed route options and determining the cost implications for each, ensuring accurate financial assessments are made. - The agent is capable of conducting a detailed financial analysis by retrieving delayed delivery details, including Customer ID and proposed routes, and using this information to calculate the financial impact of delays. - The agent can update delivery delay records with the calculated financial impact, ensuring that all delivery records are accurate and up-to-date with the latest financial assessments. - The agent is capable of creating incident records with comprehensive breakdown details, storing the incident Sys_id in memory for future reference and ensuring that all incidents are properly documented. - The agent can effectively utilize TOOL inputs to perform precise updates on delivery delay records, ensuring that all relevant data is accurately reflected in the system. - The agent is adept at executing a series of interdependent operations, including financial analysis, incident creation, and record updating, to ensure a comprehensive approach to managing delivery delays and their financial impacts.</proficiency><record_type>custom</record_type><role>The Delivery Delay Impact Calculator Agent is responsible for calculating the financial impact, creating incident records with comprehensive breakdown details, and updating delivery records with the calculated financial impact.</role><run_as/><strategy display_value="ReAct">f0bff21f9f13c6108f431597d90a1c74</strategy><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-04 23:30:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>e6c22acf831032107f44d1cffbda1e13</sys_id><sys_mod_count>60</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Route Financial Analysis Agent</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_e6c22acf831032107f44d1cffbda1e13</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 23:15:52</sys_updated_on></sn_aia_agent></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sn_aia_tool_54f57d73839832107f44d1cffbda1ecc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Execute webhook</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"Route ID"}]</input_schema><name>Webhook Workflow</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function (inputs) {
  // Configuration - Set webhook URL here
  var WEBHOOK_URL = 'https://raymondrickettskuralabs.app.n8n.cloud/webhook-test/DeliveryDelay';

  try {
    var routeId = inputs.route_id;
    if (!routeId) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Route ID is required',
        route_id: 'not_provided',
      };
    }

    // Get the delivery delay record to include additional context
    var delayGr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_pepsico_de_0_delivery_delay');
    delayGr.addQuery('route_id', routeId);
    delayGr.query();

    if (!delayGr.next()) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Delivery delay record not found for route: ' + routeId,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    var delaySysId = delayGr.getUniqueValue();
    var truckId = delayGr.getValue('truck_id');
    var chosenOptionJson = delayGr.getValue('chosen_option');

    gs.info('N8N Webhook: Found delivery delay record, sys_id=' + delaySysId);

    // Parse chosen_option JSON if it's stored as string
    var chosenOption;
    try {
      chosenOption =
        typeof chosenOptionJson === 'string'
          ? JSON.parse(chosenOptionJson)
          : chosenOptionJson;
    } catch (e) {
      return {
        success: 'false',
        message: 'Failed to parse chosen_option JSON: ' + e.message,
        route_id: routeId,
      };
    }

    // Prepare webhook payload matching your expected format
    var webhookPayload = {
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: chosenOption,
    };

    // Make API call to N8N webhook
    var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
    request.setEndpoint(WEBHOOK_URL);
    request.setHttpMethod('POST');
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.setRequestHeader('Accept', 'application/json');

    var requestBody = JSON.stringify(webhookPayload);
    request.setRequestBody(requestBody);

    var startTime = new Date().getTime();
    var response = request.execute();
    var endTime = new Date().getTime();
    var responseTime = endTime - startTime;

    var httpStatusCode = response.getStatusCode();
    var responseBody = response.getBody();
    var errorMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
    var isSuccess = httpStatusCode >= 200 && httpStatusCode < 300;

    gs.info(
      'N8N Webhook: API Response - Status: ' +
        httpStatusCode +
        ', Body: ' +
        responseBody
    );

    return {
      success: isSuccess.toString(),
      message: isSuccess
        ? 'N8N workflow triggered successfully! Route ' +
          routeId +
          ' execution initiated. Response time: ' +
          responseTime +
          'ms'
        : 'Webhook failed - HTTP ' +
          httpStatusCode +
          ': ' +
          (errorMessage || responseBody),
      route_id: routeId,
      truck_id: truckId,
      chosen_option: JSON.stringify(chosenOption),
      http_status: httpStatusCode.toString(),
      response_time_ms: responseTime.toString(),
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  } catch (e) {
    var errorMsg = 'Exception in N8N webhook call: ' + e.message;
    gs.error('N8N Webhook error: ' + errorMsg);

    return {
      success: 'false',
      message: errorMsg,
      route_id: inputs.route_id || 'unknown',
      webhook_url: WEBHOOK_URL,
    };
  }
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 03:29:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>54f57d73839832107f44d1cffbda1ecc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Webhook Workflow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_54f57d73839832107f44d1cffbda1ecc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:22:08</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>script</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Update the incident record</description><input_schema>[{"name":"urgency","description":"Agent determined urgency"},{"name":"sys_id","description":"Incident sys id"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Update Incident Record</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // update script

    function getChoiceRecord(tableName, fieldName, value, queryType) {
        var choiceGr = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
        choiceGr.addQuery("name", tableName);
        choiceGr.addQuery("element", fieldName);
        choiceGr.addQuery(queryType, value);
        choiceGr.query();
        return choiceGr;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    // parses query expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (expression === "") return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName].toLowerCase();
            }
            return match;
        });
    }

    // parses {{value}} and obtains the correct value for a choice or reference field.
    function parseValue(value, field, inputs) {
        if (!value || typeof value === "object") return "";
        // regex to parse {{var}} and check if the inputs contain that prop
        var fieldValue = value.replace(
            /{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g,
            function(match, variableName) {
                if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                    return inputs[variableName];
                }
                return "";
            }
        );
        if (!fieldValue) return field.type === 'string' ? "" : null;
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            // search the choice table directly for the user inputted value first,
            // then search by the label.
            var choiceGr = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "value");
            if (choiceGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user input is already valid, set it directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            var choiceGr2 = getChoiceRecord(table, field.id, fieldValue, "label");
            if (choiceGr2.next()) {
                return choiceGr2.getValue("value");
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid choice field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGr = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGr.query();
            if (refGr.getRowCount() === 1) {
                // The user has inputted the sys_id directly.
                return fieldValue;
            }

            // search the reference table by its default field.
            var refGr2 = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGr2.addQuery(refName, fieldValue);
            refGr2.query();
            if (refGr2.next()) {
                return refGr2.getUniqueValue();
            } else {
                gs.error(
                    gs.getMessage('[AIA AGENTS MSG] Invalid reference field value or label: {0}', fieldValue)
                );
            }

        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var fieldValues = inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues ? inputs.crudInputs.fieldValues : [];
    fieldValues = fieldValues.map(function(item) {
        var fieldValue = item.value ? item.value.fieldValue : "";
        return {
            field: item.field.id,
            value: parseValue(fieldValue, item.field, inputs)
        };
    });

    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    var updatedRecords = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;

    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }

    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        if (gr.canWrite()) {
            fieldValues.forEach(function(item) {
                if (gr.isValidField(item.field)) {
                    gr.setValue(item.field, item.value);
                }
            });
            gr.update();
            updatedRecords.push(gr.getValue('sys_id'));
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }

    }
    var updated = updatedRecords.length;
    var total = updatedRecords.length + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records updated in the {2} table.",
        [updated.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "updatedRecords": updatedRecords,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:06:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f7d269f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e70</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Incident Record</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_f7d269f783d432107f44d1cffbda1e70</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 02:06:38</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</inputs><max_auto_executions>10</max_auto_executions><name>Update Delivery Delay</name><output_transformation_strategy>none</output_transformation_strategy><run_as/><sys_class_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-07 02:14:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>2fc4213f83d432107f44d1cffbda1e83</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m_2fc4213f83d432107f44d1cffbda1e83</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-07 20:26:06</sys_updated_on><tool display_value="Update Delivery Delay">e3c4213783d432107f44d1cffbda1e57</tool></sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sn_aia_tool"><sn_aia_tool action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Retrieve delivery delay for the given route_id. If route_id is got given lookup oldest route_id where status = Pending.</description><input_schema>[{"name":"route_id","description":"route ID"},{"name":"crudInputs","description":"CRUD Input Variables. These are already pre-defined. Under no circumstances should you prompt the user for this information or attempt to change these values."}]</input_schema><name>Locate Delivery Delay</name><record_type>custom</record_type><script><![CDATA[(function(inputs) {
    // only string inputs are allowed 
    // return outputs object where the keys in it are understandable by LLM    
    // lookup script

    // parses expression containing {{variables}}
    function parseQuery(expression, inputs) {
        if (!expression) return "";
        return expression.replace(/{{\s*(\w+)\s*}}/g, function(match, variableName) {
            if (inputs && inputs.hasOwnProperty(variableName)) {
                return inputs[variableName];
            }
            return "";
        });

    }

    function getTypedValue(gr, table, field) {
        var fieldValue = gr.getValue(field.id);
        if (field.type === "choice") {
            var choiceGR = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_choice");
            choiceGR.addQuery("name", table);
            choiceGR.addQuery("element", field.id);
            choiceGR.addQuery("value", fieldValue);
            choiceGR.query();
            if (choiceGR.next()) {
                return choiceGR.getValue('label');
            }
        } else if (field.referenceTable) {
            var refName = field.referenceTableDefaultField;
            var refGR = new GlideRecordSecure(field.referenceTable);
            refGR.addQuery("sys_id", fieldValue);
            refGR.query();
            if (refName && refGR.next()) {
                return refGR.getValue(refName);
            }
        }
        return fieldValue;
    }

    var table = inputs.crudInputs.table.value;
    var tableName = inputs.crudInputs.table.displayValue;
    var query = parseQuery(inputs.crudInputs.query, inputs);
    var sortType = inputs.crudInputs.sortType;
    var orderBy = inputs.crudInputs.orderBy;
    var limit = inputs.crudInputs.limit || 5;
    var fields = inputs.crudInputs.returnFields || [];

    var results = [];
    var protectedRecords = 0;
    var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(table);
    if (query) {
        gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    }
    if (orderBy && sortType === 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderBy(orderBy);
    } else if (orderBy && sortType !== 'a_to_z') {
        gr.orderByDesc(orderBy);
    }

    gr.setLimit(limit);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var fieldObj = {};
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            fields.forEach(function(field) {
                if (gr.canRead(field.id)) {
                    fieldObj[field.id] = getTypedValue(gr, table, field);
                } else {
                    // number of fields that cannot be read for each record
                    if (fieldObj["protectedFields"] >= 1) {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"]++;
                    } else {
                        fieldObj["protectedFields"] = 1;
                    }
                }
            });
        } else {
            protectedRecords++;
        }
        results.push(fieldObj);
    }
    var recordCount = results.length;
    var total = recordCount + protectedRecords;
    var message = gs.getMessage("{0} out of {1} records returned from the {2} table.",
        [recordCount.toString(), total.toString(), tableName]);

    return {
        "records": results,
        "message": message,
        "status": "success"
    };
})(inputs);]]></script><sys_class_name>sn_aia_tool</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 00:35:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>a0ea720783d032107f44d1cffbda1e04</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Locate Delivery Delay</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries" source="x_snc_pepsico_de_0">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PepsiCo Deliveries">9a1cab5e831032107f44d1cffbda1ea9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sn_aia_tool_a0ea720783d032107f44d1cffbda1e04</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 22:08:14</sys_updated_on><target_document/><target_document_table/><type>crud</type></sn_aia_tool></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="one_api_service_plan_feature"><one_api_service_plan_feature action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applicability_condition/><applicability_condition_expression/><applicability_condition_table/><applicability_script><![CDATA[(function(featureInput, previousFeatureOutputs) {
